summary: The Supporting Our Shelters Act amends the Animal Welfare Act to establish a grant program administered by the Secretary of Agriculture. This program will provide financial support to animal shelters for animal care, including feeding, sheltering, veterinary care, and staffing. Grants are for a maximum of 3 years and are renewable. Grant recipients must report on animal intake, outcomes, and fund usage. The Secretary of Agriculture will also submit annual reports to relevant Congressional committees.
